name: Special Delivery (itch) (TICUnivali2017)
description:
Special Delivery is a 2 to 4 player arena couch game. Choose between three different maps and race and fight against your friends to see who is the fastest (and the coolest) delivery driver!

Controls: Gamepad only.

  • Right Trigger: Accelerate. 
  • Left Trigger: Brake/Reverse;
  • Left Analog: Steer.
  • A button: Boost.
  • D-pad: Navigate menus.
